inclusion.criterion: willingness and ability to sign an informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: histologically or cytologically documented prostate cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG Performance status score of 0 or 1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: received at least one cycle of IAS with an LHRH agonist and anti-androgen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willingness to remain off chronic NSAIDs (with the exception of ibuprofen or naproxen)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: not taken sulindac (Clinoril™) on regular basis for any indication for one week prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients with prior radiation must be 2 weeks from their last radiation-treatment and have recovered from all associated toxicity
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients previously on SWOG 9346 or 9921 trials, or any other trials using IAS for which adding exisulind may be confounding
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: use of an investigational medication or device within one month of initiating study therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: elevations of serum creatinine to above the upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: platelet count < 100,000/L; hgb < 9.0 g/dL; absolute neutrophil count < 1500/mm3
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known hepatic, biliary tract, renal or hematologic dysfunction which in the opinion of the Investigator or Sponsor are clinically significant or would obscure laboratory analyses or are associated with lab abnormalities
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with a history of acute urinary retention. He has a large prostate and a bladder filled with urine, but his recent blood chemistry was normal.
